name: Adaptation (trainarmadillo88)
description:
Congratulations on your new job. 

You are tasked with keeping the entity alive and contained. It will adapt to its environment and try to smash through the container. You must find the new settings to force it to change to its new environment. You must also be careful to not make changes that would harm the creature. 

Keep it alive and contained. Your job and/or life depends on it.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Dev notes

This is a project for the My First Game Jame 7/2020 game jam.

The theme was change. So I made this quick game about a creature changing to its environment.
